long_description: When you're stuck on a shady belay or running into a sudden windstorm, pull the men's Marmot Nanowick Jacket out of your pocket and ponder the ton of protection you get from a mere 4.6 ounces. Ultralight nylon jacket is wind- and water-resistant and breathable. Inner DriClime(R) mesh lining placed in key areas wicks away moisture so you stay comfortable. Zippered chest pocket has a headphone port; jacket packs into the pocket. Adjustable collar cord, elastic hem drawcord and partial elastic cuff closure all help seal wind out, warmth in. Marmot Nanowick Jacket for men offers 360-degree reflectivity. Closeout.
short_description: When you're stuck on a shady belay or running into a sudden windstorm, pull the men's Marmot Nanowick Jacket out of your pocket and ponder the ton of protection you get from a mere 4.6 ounces.
